sn2.1:2.1: 1. Paṭhamavagga
sn2.1:4.2: ekaṃ samayaṃ bhagavā sāvatthiyaṃ viharati jetavane anāthapiṇḍikassa ārāme.
sn2.1:4.3: Atha kho kassapo devaputto abhikkantāya rattiyā abhikkantavaṇṇo kevalakappaṃ jetavanaṃ obhāsetvā yena bhagavā tenupasaṅkami;
sn2.1:4.5: Ekamantaṃ ṭhito kho kassapo devaputto bhagavantaṃ etadavoca:
sn2.1:4.6: “bhikkhuṃ bhagavā pakāsesi, no ca bhikkhuno anusāsan”ti.
sn2.1:6.3: Atha kho kassapo devaputto “samanuñño me satthā”ti bhagavantaṃ abhivādetvā padakkhiṇaṃ katvā tatthevantaradhāyīti.
